product_name: Mountainsmith Quickfire Camera Bag - Medium - 2013 Special Buy
long_description: The medium-size Mountainsmith Quickfire Camera Bag protects your DSLR camera or small camcorder in a soft and secure cocoon while you are on the go. Constructed of 600-denier polyester oxford fabric for exceptional durability. Features convenient, reverse clamshell access to main compartment. Zippered pocket on front is perfect for stashing important documents, replacement batteries and memory cards. Zippered pocket under the lid holds small items secure. Rain cover in bottom panel; adjustable shoulder sling. Mountainsmith Quickfire Camera Bag measures 13 x 6.5 x 5.5 in. Special buy.
short_description: The medium-size Mountainsmith Quickfire Camera Bag protects your DSLR camera or small camcorder in a soft and secure cocoon while you are on the go.
